goal.en: 人為何有生老病死?本課程將透過論文導讀與課堂討論方式，以演化生物學的觀點，探討人類起源以及與人類醫學健康相關的問題，期望修課學生除了對本課程內容有深入了解外，並且能加強英文科學文章閱讀能力。

content.en:
1. Overview
2. Principle and Misconception of Evolutionary Biology
3. Evolutionary Genetics
4. Human Genetics and Evolution
5. Cystic Fibrosis
6. Life history tradeoffs and evolutionary biology of aging
7. Cancer
8. Host-pathogen coevolution
9. Sexually transmitted diseases
10. Malaria
11. Gene-culture coevolution: lactase persistence
12. Sociosexual Behavior
13. Reproductive Strategy and Maternal Care
14. Women Health at Post-menopausal age
15. Reproductive Strategy in Men
16. Man-made disease
17. Policy and Decision Making from Evolutionary perspective
18. Report
